name: fp
description: Readable, debbuggable & fast ES6 Functional Programming
author: Adrien Gibrat <adrien.gibrat@gmail.com>

scripts.bench: npm run bench:curry && npm run bench:collection
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:core:min && npm run build:monads && npm run build:monads:min
scripts.build:monads:min: rollup --config --environment BUILD:min --id fp.monads --globals fp:fp --input src/index.monads.js --output dist/fp.monads.min.js
scripts.perf: npm run perf:init && npm run perf:collection
scripts.perf:init: grep 1 /proc/sys/kernel/kptr_restrict > /dev/null && sudo sh -c 'echo 0 > /proc/sys/kernel/kptr_restrict && echo 1 > /proc/sys/kernel/perf_event_paranoid' || echo 'perf init already done'
scripts.perf:collection:record: perf record -i -g -q -e cycles:u -- node --perf-basic-prof src/collection.bench.js && npm run perf:script
scripts.perf:script: LANG=C perf script | egrep -v ' __libc_start| LazyCompile | v8::internal::| Builtin:| Stub:| LoadIC:|\[unknown\]| LoadPolymorphicIC:' | stackcollapse-perf 2>/dev/null | grep runbench | sed 's/LazyCompile:[*~]\?//g;s/node`//g;s|'$PWD'/||g;s/^.*runbench//' > perf/script.collapsed.txt
scripts.perf:collection: npm run perf:collection:record && npm run perf:collection:flamegraph
scripts.size: npm run size:core --silent && npm run size:core:min --silent && npm run size:monads --silent && npm run size:monads:min --silent
scripts.size:core: echo "fp raw size `cat dist/fp.js | wc -c | numfmt --to=iec-i --suffix=B`"
scripts.size:core:min: echo "fp minified & gzipped `gzip -9 -c dist/fp.min.js | wc -c | numfmt --to=iec-i --suffix=B`"
scripts.size:monads: echo "fp.monads raw size `cat dist/fp.monads.js | wc -c | numfmt --to=iec-i --suffix=B`"
scripts.size:monads:min: echo "fp.monads minified & gzipped `gzip -9 -c dist/fp.monads.min.js | wc -c | numfmt --to=iec-i --suffix=B`"
scripts.test: npm run test:partial && npm run test:curry && npm run test:compose
scripts.watch: chokidar 'src/**/*.js' --command 'time npm run build:core --silent && echo "build core done" && time npm run build:monads --silent && echo "build monads done"'
scripts.watch:core: chokidar 'src/**/*.js' --command 'time npm run build:core --silent && echo "build core done"'
scripts.watch:monads: chokidar 'src/**/*.js' --command 'time npm run build:monads --silent && echo "build monads done"'
